text:
Maple Syrup Media (Quidco) | Senior PHP Developer | Sheffield | ONSITE http://www.com.maplenerds/

Maple Syrup Media is hiring Senior PHP Developers!

With over 5 million members, £800 million (1% of all UK online spend) in sales generated last year through 4,300 retail merchants and plans expand into emerging markets in Europe, Quidco is growing from strength to strength.

We're for looking talented PHP developers, Our ideal candidate is self-­motivated and an easy going team player. Must thrive in a fast paced environment and be able to produce high quality code following an Agile methodology. http://www.maplenerds.com/senior-php-developer/

Interview process typically includes an online coding test, phone, and face-to-face interviews.

Please send CV to a.keyes[at]quidco[dot]com or submit details on the job spec page above.
